Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign Doraemon character with classic style: improve proportions, add iconic details

Replace the previous design with a more authentic Doraemon character featuring:
- Classic sky blue gradient body \(#42A5F5 â†’ #1976D2\)
- Proper white face and belly proportions
- Four-dimensional pocket on the belly
- Expressive eyes with dynamic states \(calm/warning/alarm\)
- Red nose with highlight effect
- Six whiskers \(three on each side\)
- Red collar with golden bell
- Enhanced SVG gradients and shadow filters

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

EOF
\)")
